items.description:
This is intended to be a curation of resources for the new among the software testing community. It is not tailored to a specific area (Usability/Performance) or role (Automation/Management). The idea is that you could hand this list to a CS graduate and it would greatly improve their testing skills, efficiency and overall breadth of knowledge. Note that this is for all areas of software testing after the code in question is written (no unit tests/static analysis!).
Finally, I'm sure everyone who reads this list has one thing they want to add. Please read the How to Contribute page and add to the list. :)
items.title: Foreword

items.description: Zero-code API testing platform for Java/Kotlin. Captures deep runtime context (HTTP, SQL, methods), auto-generates mocks from real traffic, and enables Live Context Replay for E2E testing and debugging.
items.title: BitDive

items.description: A tool for developers and API testers to check if an API is CORS-enabled for a given domain and identify gaps.
items.title: CORS Tester

items.description: Vedic astrology API with free sandbox environment for testing. Includes Postman collection, 108+ endpoints, and AI-powered chatbot API for integration testing.
items.title: Vedika API

items.description: Professional software tool for HTTP testing and debugging.
items.title: HttpMaster

items.description: API Testing Platform that automatically generates unit test cases along with dependency mocks.
items.title: Keploy

items.description: REST API testing framework based on Gherkin.
items.title: RestQA

items.description: Truly declarative API testing framework in Js, or plain JSON.
items.title: SpecTest

items.description: API testing in plain English with extendable Python implementation.
items.title: Zato API Test

items.description: Ultimate tool to measure gRPC service coverage from tests.
items.title: Tests Coverage Tool

items.description: The Swagger Coverage Tool is designed to measure API test coverage based on Swagger documentation. It provides automated tracking and reporting of test coverage for APIs, helping ensure that your endpoints and services are well-tested.
items.title: Swagger Coverage Tool

items.description: Enterprise-grade tool for testing, debugging, and logging incoming webhooks in real-time.
items.title: Webhook Debugger & Logger

items.description: Manipulate the browser by exploiting any XSS vulnerabilities you find.
items.title: BeEF

items.description: Intercepting proxy for HTTP traffic manipulation, security scanning, and exploitation.
items.title: OWASP ZAP

items.description: Intercept API and Reply with changes in realtime with according api manipulations.
items.title: BurpSuite

items.description: nuclie is automated scanner for common vulnerbilty finding on site.
items.title: Nuclei Scanner

items.description: Easy to use no-code mock servers for service virtualization. Rest, SOAP, GraphQL supported. Create an API mock server from OpenAPI Specification or Postman collection.
items.title: Beeceptor

items.description: Web server using HTTP dumps as a response source for API simulation.
items.title: DeepfakeHTTP

items.description: Open source HTTP mock engine written in Java. Embed in your test code, run as a standalone process, or deploy via Docker.
items.title: WireMock

items.description: Screenshot pixel and DOM change comparisons.
items.title: Fluxguard

items.description: AI-powered visual validation for Playwright tests.

items.description: Change comparison tool with Golden Masters and "unbreakable Selenium" tests.

items.description: Autonomous visual regression testing platform.
items.title: wopee.io

items.description: UI Testing Frawnework.

items.description: No-code test automation tool for web applications.

items.description: Declarative BDD UI testing with Gherkin.
items.title: Courgette

items.description: Private device lab infrastructure for mobile testing. Connect your own iOS/Android devices and run Appium, Maestro, or XCUITest remotely via WebRTC. Zero-trust architecture keeps test data on your network.

items.description: Chrome automation via CDP with a high-level Ruby API.
items.title: Ferrum

items.description: Scalable headless browser testing with built-in session recording.
items.title: Hyperbrowser

items.description: Open-source end-to-end testing agent.

items.description: Open-source AI-powered end-to-end testing tool for APIs and microservices that auto-generates test cases and mocks from real traffic.

items.description: AI-powered test case discovery and maintenance.

items.description: BDD-style Playwright testing.

items.description: A funny and educational list of why nothing in Software Development is ever easy. Think you can store a marriage in a DB?

items.description: This is the famous list of Naughty Strings. If you're doing some field validation, look no further for inspiration.

items.title: Unicode

items.description: The awesome list of awesome lists.
items.title: The Original

items.description: Learning to code, for those looking to make the move to automation
items.title: Learn to Code

items.description: Incredibly extensive, but you'll find something to fit the bill.
items.title: Application Security

items.description: Better than searching Google if you know what you want.
